titles.title: Homeowners Insurance Assistance Act of 2007

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit against tax for increased homeowners insurance premiums suffered by certain coastal homeowners or resulting from hurricane events.
Homeowners Insurance Assistance Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Homeowners Insurance Assistance Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers in certain hurricane disaster areas a tax credit for 50% of their homeowner insurance premiums, up to $250 annually.
